sub_title: Senior QA Tester & QA Supervisor at Tenzinger
summary:
Enthusiastic about delivering flawless software experiences to users by hunting down and reporting bugs.  With a proven track record in software testing and quality assurance, I'm dedicated to ensuring the highest levels of reliability and functionality in every product I touch. I am a quick learner and love to expand my skill set.

🔬 My Expertise:

✅ Manual and Automated Testing
✅ Test Strategy and Planning
✅ Test coordination
✅ Bug Tracking and Reporting
✅ Regression Testing
✅ Agile and Scrum
✅ Coaching other QAs

awards.title: On the Spot Award
awards.description:
Achievement:

Neha took the participation in RiO week event organized by TCS and she is the winner in poster competition and RiO Bingo. Congratulations and thanks for your participation

awards.title: Best Team
awards.description:
Achievement: 

SNM team has given outstanding performance during current Year. Team delighted the business Users with quick resolution of the tickets and excellent interpersonal skills. Right S and M has managed to maintain all time high Customer Satisfaction Index CSI of around 4.5. Similarly in Singapore region team has improved the CSI from 3.8 in Jan-2014 to 3.99 Nov-2015. Customer satisfaction is ultimate reward and increased CSI is testimony to this claim. In addition to this, team has received several appreciation from business Users and management team. Apart from regular activities, team has extended helping hand to other teams like from Principle to resolve the tickets and bring the ticket count down. Kudos to team. S and M production support team has done the tremendous work to close the huge volume of tickets raise by user. In addition to regular handling of issues, team has done the File patching and Data extraction Automation in all regions to reduce user load and gave value addition to customer. Additionally continuous offline optimization has kept the offline window within limit,5 percent of window is reduced as well,it has maintained the good application availability for customer . Ticket closure rate by team greater than Ticket arrival rate for almost 6 month where tickets received more than base line of 840. Team has done the Value addition of cost 226428 USD. Total Revenue generated from CRs is of USD 356624

awards.title: On The Spot Award
awards.description:
Achievement: 

Neha has done the good work in the File patching and Data extraction. She has given good effort to learn the system and working hard in tickets closure. Appreciate the hard work.

projects.title: AXA Asia - Support & Maintenance
projects.description:
S&M is production support and maintenance of AXA for online as well offline support for RLS. 

•	Process Automations to reduce ticket count.
•	Preparing UTR for some problem tickets.
•	Priority setting and advising ticket type to service desk.
•	Implementing test cases
•	File Patching, Data Extraction
•	Grooming new team members about all the processes followed.

Tools / Technology: Microsoft Office, AS/400, RPG-ILE, CL-400, DB2-400, DB2, PDM, ACMS, I series navigator, Service Now

contributors.headline: Senior QA Tester & QA Supervisor at Tenzinger

projects.title: AXA Asia - R030
projects.description:
R030 is a release in AXA which is an insurance based project(working in 8 regions of ASIA). Since it is an enhancement project, we get multiple change requirements that client wants to be applicable for coming year, which can be bundled. That requirement is developed and delivered as a release. 

•	Worked as a tester / developer in AS400 technology. 
•	Involved in Test case designing and control test cases related to major requirement in this release.
•	Prepared test reports and provide functional and technical documents.
•	Retrofitting, Testing and Supporting change request from client.
•	Worked in all the phases of SDLC (designing, coding, testing and maintenance). 

Tools / Technology: Microsoft Office, AS/400, RPG-ILE, CL-400, DB2-400, DB2, PDM, ACMS, I series navigator

contributors.headline: Senior QA Tester & QA Supervisor at Tenzinger

projects.title: Humana
projects.description:
It is US healthcare insurance enhancement project where we had different requirements to enhance the current healthcare policies like E-pharmacy, ID card system to avail benefits.
I was working for ID card system, where Policy holder had an ID card and in same ID card he can add/remove beneficiaries and can even generate a report where he can view all the benefits availed. User can apply for new ID card or reissue in case of damaged or lost ID card.

Tools / Technology: MS SQL Server 2012, MS Visual studio 2012 Express, HTML, C#, selenium

contributors.headline: Senior QA Tester & QA Supervisor at Tenzinger

projects.title: Order Management System(OMS)
projects.description:
In OMS as a whole, there were buyers, suppliers and admin as users. Suppliers will be registered in system, they can update stock details, generate invoice, does the shipment and tracks payment. Buyers will order products online, pays the bill, confirm the shipment and can give product review. 

In Payment processing module, Buyer initiates the payment process for the invoices which are accepted and the delivery is completed. Buyer will also create Remittance Advice as a receipt of the payment made for the invoices.
Supplier will accept each RA created so that the Order can be completed. Supplier also track the payment by viewing and sending notification to the payment defaulters.

Tools / Technology: MS SQL Server 2012, MS Visual studio 2012 Express, HTML, C#

contributors.headline: Senior QA Tester & QA Supervisor at Tenzinger

projects.title: Emigrate
projects.description:
This project was for Indian government who wants to keep track of all the emigrants moving out of India. Also, Ministry want to make agents like recruiting agents, enrollment agents, project exporters, and Foreign employers responsible to these emigrants. 
The major elements involved in this project are:
• Facilitation of online submission of application and availing various migration services. The system calculates the fee payable for the service availed and accepts online payment through credit cards and Internet banking. Upon successful submission of a request, an Application Reference Number (ARN) and Payment Receipt will be provided to the user, which may be used for future correspondence with ministry.
• Processing of the submitted application- The request will be routed dynamically to the concerned office and authority for processing

Tools / Technology: 
J2EE, XML, HTML, Frameworks (Struts 2.0), IBM WebSphere Application Server, Eclipse Galileo (3.5)

profile_positions.description:
•	Responsible for creating test scripts, analyze impact and perform manual test of application.
•	Involved in functional testing, regression testing and system tests.
•	Involved in test automation using PHP.
•	Worked as a Scrum Master for around 6 months.

These activities were transferred to Tenzinger on 1 January 2021
profile_positions.title: QA Engineer

profile_positions.description:
•	Responsible for developing, planning and implementing test cases based on software     requirements, user input and technical understanding
•	Responsible for developing and executing automated testing strategies
•	Responsible for functional, system and regression tests to establish the software capability and reliability
•	Assist in reproducing, investigating and debugging software issues in coordination with the development team
•	Document and report test outcomes by collecting, analysing, interpreting and summarizing data to the development team
•	Contribution in Test Planning, Test Execution and Defect tracking
•	Involved in Production Support and Maintenance based applications including various types of data extraction, file patching, process automation and bug fixing
